column3: (a) Platform 4 re-occupation 3 minutes in same direction only, oppositedirection re-occupation is subject to special instructions.(b) Where trains are using the same platform in the OPPOSITE direction, theplatform re-occupation time will be 4 minutes including where trains havereversed at Platform 4.
